video_prompt: A majestic whale soars through a celestial sky, its iridescent skin shimmering with pastel light as glowing particles stream from its body and tail, leaving a sparkling trail. Ethereal, shimmering fish-like creatures swim alongside, also leaving light trails. A larger, jellyfish-like creature with trailing tentacles drifts. Clouds shift subtly, bathed in warm, dynamic light.
image_prompt: Majestic iridescent whale soaring through a celestial sky at dawn/dusk, leaving a shimmering trail of starlight. Fluffy pastel clouds, ethereal glowing fish, and a jellyfish-like creature accompany it. Fantasy, otherworldly, awe-inspiring.
refined_video_prompt: A whale soars gracefully, its surface subtly shifting and shimmering with iridescent light. Glowing particles actively stream from its body and tail, forming a sparkling, winding trail. Ethereal, fish-like creatures swim fluidly alongside, each leaving a distinct light trail. A large, jellyfish-like entity drifts slowly, its trailing tentacles subtly undulating. In the background, clouds continuously shift and morph, dynamically bathed in ever-changing light.
